author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: Italy has second-deadliest day with deaths up 743
description: IMF expects G20 action plan will trigger global recession
content:
The coronavirus pandemic has infected more than 382,000 people worldwide, with at least 16,500 deaths.
Leaders from the Group of 20 major economies will convene a video conference on Thursday to discuss the coronavirus epidemic, multiple sources said, amid c… [+5318 chars]
